name: CCUT-[11.3Mb] for Download-It is worth for Download and play

description:
[DownLoad] CCUTChaos Craft : Urun Temple [Click me to download](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/ccut/files/>)

At First , i am sorry for my suckily English.(Does it spell right ? suck - suckily ? Whatever ...)

Second,i am an chinese player.In chinese bettlenet,i am [JamseRMH],in TW bettlenet,i am [CNdarkadam].

JamesRMH=CNdarkadam=Me

And i want to thanks to this guys,you are my teachers,without your models,libs,icons,assets,i can not made this map.

**I learn a lot from you.Thanks again.**

1)Talent System

2)Team bar systerm watch the vedio or screenshot

3)Ai systerm of Bass

4)Computer assistant systerm

5)Boss level systermBoss can get EXP from being hurt or attack players

6)TPS control systerm

7)Size: 11.3Mb

8)Download - Had already completely upload. Please Fun.

9)Hey guys,Thanks again.

**this map is design with the Chinese [StarCraft II Editor],the language is CHINESE. I know it is suck to play a map that write by foreign language.**

Sorry,cau'z i don't write in Englih for a long time.Speak in English is not a big problem,but not write in English.Sorry again.

But , this map is worth to play along,or play with your friends.
